Name: oid
Description: Row identifier (hidden attribute; must be explicitly\nselected)

Name: opcmethod
Description: Index access method operator class is for

Name: opcfamily
Description: Operator family containing the operator class

Name: opcintype
Description: Data type that the operator class indexes

Name: opcdefault
Description: True if this operator class is the default for opcintype

Name: opckeytype
Description: Type of data stored in index, or zero if same as opcintype
